Algorithms

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • Algorithms.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that defines a map, with coordiante ranges, and pixel ranges. Also it supports the conversation of pixels to coordiantes and vice versa
